languages.text: "И что заставило тебя размышлять о том, как оказать мне знак внимания?"

traits.locale_text: И почему же ты посвятил столько размышлений комплименту мне

languages.text: "And what made you muse about how to make overtures toward me?"
languages.original_text: "И что заставило тебя размышлять о том, как оказать мне знак внимания?"

traits.locale_text: "And what made you muse about how to make overtures toward me?"
"And what made you muse about how to make overtures toward me?"
"And what made you muse about how to make overtures toward me?"
"And what made you muse about how to make overtures toward me?"
"And what made you muse about how to make overtures toward me?"

languages.text: 「それで、どうして{mf|俺|私}にアプローチしようなんて考えたんだ？」
languages.original_text: "And what made you muse about how to make overtures toward me?"

traits.locale_text: 「それで、どうして{mf|俺|私}にアプローチしようなんて考えたんだ？」

languages.text: "Und was hat Euch veranlasst, zu erwägen, mir Avancen zu machen?"
languages.original_text: "And what made you muse about how to make overtures toward me?"

traits.locale_text: "Und was hat Euch veranlasst, zu erwägen, mir Avancen zu machen?"

languages.text: « Et qu'est-ce qui vous a incité à réfléchir au meilleur moyen de me séduire ? »
languages.original_text: "And what made you muse about how to make overtures toward me?"

traits.locale_text: « Et qu'est-ce qui vous a incité à réfléchir au meilleur moyen de me séduire ? »

languages.text: «¿Y qué le ha llevado a plantearse ese tipo de insinuaciones?».
languages.original_text: "And what made you muse about how to make overtures toward me?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y qué le ha llevado a plantearse ese tipo de insinuaciones?».

languages.text: “是什么原因，让你想对我示好呢？”
languages.original_text: "And what made you muse about how to make overtures toward me?"

traits.locale_text: “是什么原因，让你想对我示好呢？”

languages.text: "Peki bu tasavvurları yazmaya seni iten neydi?"
languages.original_text: "And what made you muse about how to make overtures toward me?"

traits.locale_text: "Peki bu tasavvurları yazmaya seni iten neydi?"
